Control Name: COST 1.3 Establish cloud budgets and forecasts
Control Statement: Adjust existing organizational budgeting and forecasting processes to be compatible with the highly variable nature of cloud costs and usage. Processes must be dynamic using trend based or business driver-based algorithms, or a combination.
